answerText: Thus Spake Zarathustra [or Also Sprach Zarathustra][10] This philosopher used the phrase "god is dead" in both Thus Spake Zarathustra and The Gay Science.
heading: Penn Bowl |2014 | 14 | 20 | Philosophy | None | College
subject: Philosophy
question: Question: This book contains a number of traditional Dionysian hymns known as dithyrambs. For 10 points each: [10] Name this book, in which a man who encounters an eagle and a snake describes the process one undergoes in order to become a master of himself - the Ã¼bermensch - and satisfy the will to power.
